org.drip.product.quote
Class ComponentQuote

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.product.quote.ComponentQuote

public class ComponentQuote
extends Serializer

This class holds the different types of quotes for a given component. It contains a single market field/quote pair, but multiple alternate named quotes (to accommodate quotes on different measures for the component).
